title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimizing storage costs for Amazon EVS with FSx for ONTAP (MAM101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 FSx for ONTAP 优化 Amazon EVS 的存储成本 (MAM101)
abstract: VMware users navigating cloud migration face challenges such as high TCO, complex data migration, and inconsistent hybrid cloud operations. Amazon Elastic VMware Service (EVS) offers a seamless path to migrate VMware workloads to AWS without replatforming or refactoring. When your Amazon EVS data is stored on Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP, you have opened a new range of possibilities for enterprise data management. Your data can seamlessly migrate from on-premises to cloud. You can protect your data with Autonomous Ransomware Protection. And you can optimize your storage utilization with enterprise storage features normally found from on-premises solutions.  This presentation is brought to you by NetApp, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: VMware 用户在进行云迁移时面临诸多挑战，例如高总拥有成本 (TCO)、复杂的数据迁移以及不一致的混合云运营。Amazon Elastic VMware Service (EVS) 提供了一条无缝路径，可将 VMware 工作负载迁移到 AWS，无需重新平台化或重构。当您的 Amazon EVS 数据存储在 Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP 上时，您将开启企业数据管理的全新可能性。您的数据可以从本地无缝迁移到云端。您可以通过自主勒索软件防护来保护数据。您还可以利用通常在本地解决方案中才有的企业存储功能来优化存储利用率。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 NetApp 为您呈现。
